summary: If you\'re tired of always reducing to tray Skyrim to look if the item you find is unique or not than this mod is your solution.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod made with the Creation Kit that adds (U) at the end of the item name.
The items were choosen from here:
http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Unique_Items

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
To install just extract the file in the Skyrim/Data folder and check it in data files of the launcher
author: LLoyd95
